overview: Max (Drew Dixon) goes to see Dr. Ludlow (Jax Thirio) with hopes that he can get his addiction to stimulation under control. When Dr. Ludlow realizes that Max's compulsions are out of control, he suggests exposure therapy claiming that the more Max is stimulated, the less he will seek stimulation. They move through their session in attempt to sexually overstimulate Max.
title: Exposure Therapy
